src:
ＮＹダウ、２日連続で最高値…米中協議進展の見方強まる

05 Nov 2019, 21:40

　【ニューヨーク＝小林泰明】５日のニューヨーク株式市場は、米中貿易摩擦の緩和への期待が継続し、ダウ平均株価（３０種）は２日連続で過去最高値を更新した。終値は前日比３０・５２ドル高の２万７４９２・６３ドルだった。
　英紙フィナンシャル・タイムズ（ＦＴ）電子版などが、米国が９月に発動した中国に対する制裁関税の撤廃を検討していると報じ、米中貿易協議が順調に進展しているとの見方が強まった。
　全米供給管理協会（ＩＳＭ）が５日発表した１０月の非製造業景況指数が前月から改善し、米景気に対する安心感も広がり、買い注文を支えた。
　ただ、当面の利益を確定しようとする売り注文もあり、値上がりは小幅にとどまった。
　情報技術（ＩＴ）企業の銘柄が多いナスダック店頭市場の総合指数の終値は、１・４８ポイント高の８４３４・６８だった。
text:
NY Dow, the highest price for two consecutive days ...

05 Nov 2019, 21:40

[New York = Yasuaki Kobayashi] In the New York stock market on the 5th, expectations for alleviating trade friction between the US and China continued, and the Dow average stock price (30 types) reached a record high for two consecutive days. The closing price was $ 27,492.63, $ 30.52 higher than the previous day.
The British Financial Times (FT) electronic version reported that the US is considering the removal of sanctions on China, which was launched in September, and the view that US-China trade talks are making good progress .
The National Supply Management Association (ISM) announced on October 5 that the non-manufacturing business conditions index in October improved from the previous month, and the sense of security for the US economy expanded, supporting buying orders.
However, there was also a sell order to determine the profit for the time being, and the price increase was modest.
The closing price of the overall index of the Nasdaq over-the-counter market, which has many brands of information technology (IT) companies, was 8434.68, which was 1.48 points higher.
